title: Can your arduino be used as a keyboard, or mouse?

fields.name: You want to use your arduino for a Human Interface Device?
fields.value: Arduino has many boards that can be used as a mouse/keyboard natively. This is reffered to as a HID.

fields.name: Boards that are __NOT__ HID compliant.
fields.value: Uno (R3 or older), Mega, Nano, Pro mini, cannot be used as a HID device.

fields.name: Boards that __ARE__ HID compliant.
fields.value: Uno R4, Giga, RP2040, Leonardo, (Pro)Micro, any other 8u2/16u2/at90usb8/162/32u2/32u4 board, Zero, MKR1000.
